ygData.subject: Re: Necro lvl'ing question
ygData.msgSnippet: Chief Gan Shralok is S A F E as you can get, but little slow in Kithcor,  Cordelia Minster in NK is good, but if you time it right you might pull a gaurd and
ygData.messageBody:
Chief Gan'Shralok is S A F E as you can get, but
little slow in Kithcor, Cordelia Minster in NK is
good, but if you time it right you might pull a gaurd
and have to zone, but really good exp and the zone is
so close it is well worth it, and WHAT did was Lars
and Juhn McMannus, well actullaly just Lars, which you
can take solo pretty easy even if McMannus is not
begin camped, just pull him to the side with the cliff
and away from the barb lady merchant with the armour,
and btw you can sell to her, pull with dark, run DOT,
turn you pets taunt off, sic your pet on him, then
Life Tap or SoP as needed. I could usually get him to
follow me with out sticking on my pet, and used my pet
as a very effective dot, and would fear as needed. At
22 any necro worth his salt should try to take the
Treant in WK at the solo spawn, VERY good money and
easy to risk to kill. But great exp up to 26, and
still good at 27. eqnecro.com is a good resource

Xiven Dryblood
